title: Boy in the Water: Album Review by The Equal Ground
content: '...an interesting Americana folk-rock sound that evokes the more countryside of Ryan Adams and some of the early albums of M. Ward.'

title: Pre-Sale tickets for Summer Break Festival now available!
content: John Patrick Halling & The Outside Voices make their Kent Stage debut on June 28th as the opening act for the inaugural Summer Break Festival in Kent, OH. Pre-sale tickets are avaialble for $10. Contact JPH via e-mail to reserve your ticket (johnpatrickhalling@yahoo.com)

title: U.S. Acoustic Tour to be announced soon
content: Hey, folks! Just wanted to sign in and let you know I've been hard at work preparing a cross-country acoustic tour this summer. I'll be in a lot of new cities/states and I couldn't be more excited! More information is coming soon. Until then, sit tight, and thank you so much for your continued support. For more news/updates follow the link to my official facebook page!
